post_text: October 27, 2018 at 7:51 PM#1I'm having trouble remembering how to run individual lines of a macro. I want to fire line 2 of a macro I created within a sequence. Can someone help me?Cheers!

posts.post_text: November 5, 2018 at 3:42 PM#3HiYou don't need Go, as it is the default keyword for macromacro 1."macro".line

title: Run individual lines of a single macro
